member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionView
member.summary: Encapsulates common data operations like sorting, grouping and filtering over IEnumerable instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionView.Refresh
member.summary: Re-evaluates data operations and rebuilds the view.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionView.GetFlattenView
member.summary: Gets a flat representation of the current view. That is to merge all groups and items (if any) in one collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionView.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets the that allows to iterate through currently present items.

member.summary: Notifies that this instance is no longer suspended. Allows inheritors to provide their own update logic.
member.param: True if an Update is requested, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionView.View
member.summary: Gets the current view over the original data with all the filtering, grouping and sorting applied.

member.summary: Determines whether a data operation is defined within the view.

member.summary: Gets or sets the source data to create view for.

member.summary: Gets the count of all the items present within the view after data operations are completed.

member.summary: Gets the collection with all the sort descriptors registered with the view.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Data.CollectionViewEnumerationMode
member.summary: Defines how a instance may be iterated.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Data.CollectionViewEnumerationMode.Standard
member.summary: Standard iteration. If grouping is applied, only the groups are enumerated.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Data.CollectionViewEnumerationMode.Flatten
member.summary: View is always considered as a flat collection. If grouping is applied, depth-first approach is used to traverse groups and their child items.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Data.RadCollectionViewSource
member.summary: Represents an extended that allows for core data operations like grouping, sorting and filtering.

member.summary: Updates the current instance after a change in the raw data. Allows inheritors to provide additional logic upon the change.
